# shinyMods

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of shinyMods is to illustrate approaches to building shiny modules.

## Installation

You can install the development version of shinyMods from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("matthewcurrier/shinyMods")
```
